channel.title: Moritz Kröger
channel.description: I am Moritz Kröger, a German front-end developer who lives in Berlin. Although Germans typically have a thing for extra long compound words, I am a friend of short functions.

item.title: ES2016: Should the Future of JavaScript Be Developer-Driven?
Adding the ECMAScript 6 flavour to your IDE
item.description: Using ECMAScript 6 features is all cool and feels good, but all that makes little sense without syntax support in an IDE.

item.title: How to setup an ES6 production-ready project
item.description: As ES6 is really hyped this year and the specification has eventually been finished, I wanted to start using it. By today I have turned almost all my private projects and a couple of client projects into a solid ES6 setup.
